issue.title: [CI][C++][Python] s390x builds time out
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17715](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17715). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The s390x builds currently time out on Travis-CI while compiling Arrow C++.
The s390x execution resources at Travis-CI are probably too weak for compiling Arrow...
